me athara kihipa denek aanduwe sitimata nam thawath waradana waraprasada awashya bawath kolaba pradeshayen niwasak, wahanayak ha thamange birindawarunta rajaye wadagath thanathuru laba dena lesa da illa athi athara eyata sakachchawata sahabhagi wu prabhalayan siya kamaththa pala kota athi athara wyawasthawak gena ena thuru pamanak ho aanduwe sitina lesa ayada sitina bawa, sirisena janadhipathiwaraya bayadu swarayen siyalu manthriwarungen illa siti bawa eekabaddha wipakshayata ek wana manthri warun kihipa denekma pawasuha.
